sentences.en: "Yes, I know that," Kelly said, screwing the silencer onto the pistol.
sentences.cn: “是的，我知道那事。”凯利一边把消音器拧到手枪上一边说道。

sentences.en: A carpenter's tools include saws, hammers, and screw - drivers.
sentences.cn: 木工的工具包括锯子 、 锤子和旋凿.

sentences.en: Can you screw up this handle for me?
sentences.cn: 你能帮我把这个把手拧紧 吗 ?

sentences.en: Close your eyes and screw them up tight.
sentences.cn: 合上眼睛，闭紧。

sentences.en: Fix the frame in position and tighten the screws .
sentences.cn: 把框子固定在正确位置上，拧紧螺丝。

sentences.en: Fix the frame in position and tighten the screws.
sentences.cn: 把框子固定在正确位置上，拧紧螺丝。

sentences.en: I used my thumbnail to tighten the screw on my lamp.
sentences.cn: 我用拇指指甲把台灯上的螺钉拧紧了。

sentences.en: Let's screw the two pipes together end to end.
sentences.cn: 咱们把这两根管子接起来拧紧.

sentences.en: Lifting those boxes really screwed up my back.
sentences.cn: 抬这些箱确实令我的背部受到损伤

sentences.en: Next, close your eyes then screw them up tight.
sentences.cn: 接着，合上双眼，然后再用力闭紧。

sentences.en: now Stephen had to screw up his courage and confess.
sentences.cn: 现在斯蒂芬不得不鼓起勇气承认。

sentences.en: Screw down any loose floorboards.
sentences.cn: 用螺钉固定住所有松动的地板。

sentences.en: Screw down the lid fairly tightly.
sentences.cn: 把盖子拧紧。

sentences.en: screwed up my courage.
sentences.cn: 鼓起我的勇气

sentences.en: She tried to screw him out of his winnings.
sentences.cn: 她试图把他赢的钱骗走.

sentences.en: The lens screws onto the front of the camera.
sentences.cn: 镜头旋扣在照相机正面。

sentences.en: The screw has loosened.
sentences.cn: 螺丝钉松了.

sentences.en: The two pieces screw together easily.
sentences.cn: 这两个部件很容易拧紧.

sentences.en: There should be no exposed screw heads.
sentences.cn: 螺钉顶端不应该外露。

sentences.en: this job can really screw you up.
sentences.cn: 这份工作真能使你精神紧张。

sentences.en: This loose screw needs a turn or two.
sentences.cn: 这只松动的螺钉需要旋动一两下.

sentences.en: Turn the screw to the right to tighten it.
sentences.cn: 向右转动螺钉把它拧紧.

sentences.en: why are you trying to screw up your life?.
sentences.cn: 你为什么要把生活搞得一团糟？。

sentences.en: Why don't we screw a handle on the door?
sentences.cn: 我们为什么不在门上安个把手 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 扭曲的；螺旋形的；古怪的；疯颠的
拧紧（screw的ing形式）；用螺钉固定

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)困难情况下又添加的压力；雪上加霜
滚珠螺杆；滚珠丝杆；球头螺钉

phrases.phrase: have one's head screwed on (the right way)

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)给（某人）施加心理压力；强迫（某人）
螺杆式压缩机；螺旋压迫器
滑牙；[美俚]脱线；做事古怪
螺旋压榨机，螺旋压力机
&I{【俚语】} 使心情烦乱或紧张

phrases.phrase: turn (或 tighten) the screw (或 screws)

phrases.tran_cn: 双螺旋桨；双推进器；双驱动桥

trans.tran_cn: 螺丝钉，螺旋桨，螺旋状物，（螺丝的）转，扭，吝啬鬼
trans.tran_en: a thin pointed piece of metal that you push and turn in order to fasten pieces of metal or wood together
to fasten or close something by turning it, or to be fastened in this way

trans.tran_cn: 扭转，扭歪，旋紧，（和某人）性交
用螺丝拧紧，扭曲（某人的面孔），〈俚〉占便宜，诈骗
trans.tran_en: to attach one thing to another using a screw
to fasten or close something by turning it, or to be fastened in this way
